name: Long Run
description:
Long Run

An endless runner game.

This game is about you trying to go through life by avoiding all the obstacles in your path. You try to overcome all those emotional issues, life problems, and other sh*t this world throws in your way,

how to play?

you can use A and D (or) left arrow and right arrow keys to move.

if you are on mobile, touch left or right to move.

Note: This game is fast-paced, And it requires you to act as fast as possible.

Tell me what you think in the comments.
